item.description:
Afternoon Delights!
Spring forward with four speakers and the angels!
Saturday, MARCH 31, 1-5 pm $20 for all four seminars
There will be samples and handouts, so please rsvp!
Judy@AHigherBalance.com

The afternoon opens with sacred ceremony honoring the four directions.
Please arrive by 1 or before!
*Walk the medicine wheel and reflect on your path through the wheel to determine goals and insights for your healing and harmony. Angel, Goddess & Ascended Master cards will be there to speak to you. Guided by Judy.
*Learn how your goals can be supported with Bach Flower Remedies. Talk lead by Gail Kobialka (free samples!)
*Stay aligned with your new goals with a self-healing method from Donna Eden's Energy Medicine (You will receive a handout). Guided by Deb Duxbury, Energy Medicine graduate
*Learn from an Introduction to Akashic Records how a records reading can bring healing and harmony. With certified practitioner Jennifer Chapman.
Each seminar lasts approximately 45 minutes. Join us anytime but we encourage you to spend the afternoon with us!
Join us for closing ceremony
Snacks included. Join us for fun, community, raffles, free samples!
Raffles: 3 private angel card readings with Judy (30 minutes);
3 Akashic record readings with Jennifer.
Raffle winners will be selected at the end of their seminars.
item.name: Afternoon Delights! A healing sampler
